name: UBTTask_MoveTo
doc:
Move To task node.
Moves the AI pawn toward the specified Actor or Location blackboard entry using the navigation system.

AcceptableRadius: fixed distance added to threshold between AI and goal location in destination reach test
FilterClass: "None" will result in default filter being used
ObservedBlackboardValueTolerance:
if task is expected to react to changes to location represented by BB key
    this property can be used to tweak sensitivity of the mechanism. Value is
    recommended to be less than AcceptableRadius
bObserveBlackboardValue: if move goal in BB changes the move will be redirected to new location
bAllowPartialPath: if set, use incomplete path when goal can't be reached
bTrackMovingGoal: if set, path to goal actor will update itself when actor moves
bRequireNavigableEndLocation: if set, the goal location will need to be navigable
bProjectGoalLocation: if set, goal location will be projected on navigation data (navmesh) before using
bReachTestIncludesAgentRadius: if set, radius of AI's capsule will be added to threshold between AI and goal location in destination reach test
bReachTestIncludesGoalRadius: if set, radius of goal's capsule will be added to threshold between AI and goal location in destination reach test
